Speaker2: Hi country guy, my husband and I live in the country too.
Speaker1: Born and raised on a farm with horses.
Speaker2: Cool. No horses here, just a german shepherd.
Speaker1: My family has generations of experience in the horse business.
Speaker2: Ok. do you have any hobbies?
Speaker1: I am busy in college studying law.
Speaker2: That's quite to hobby. I like Nhl and those adult coloring books.
Speaker1: Adult coloring books are all the rage.
Speaker2: They sure are. I even have one with horses.
Speaker1: Well I might have to check that one out.
Speaker2: Sure. I can not really say the same about law school.
Speaker1: I hope it pays off in the long run.
target_repsonse: Me too. I'll be nice to know an attorney.

history: Hello! How are you this evening? Pretty good. Got some pizza coming. Whoo! Alright! I'm craving pizza, I'm pregnant with twins. Oh wow. all I've is a dog. That's enough for me. What kind of dog do you have? Doberman. His name is charlie. Sweet. Do you work? I work in a bank. I produce music. What do you do at the bank? I'm a teller. I sit all day which helps with my pregnant belly. When are you due? I've 2 months to go. I've 2 girls already and this is a boy. I thought it was twins? Sorry boys. I forget sometimes pregnant brains. Lol. You will be busy with all those kids. I just bought my first house too. Pretty stressful at the moment.

history: My parents are teachers and together we love board games. My biggest fear is being attacked by scorpions. We go to the beach together during our vacations. I work for the government, the u s postal service to be exact. They're horrible, are they insects or animals? I believe they're insects, Ny daddy use to drive a nascar race car. Wow, you sounded like the secret service. I love concerts. My dog which is a german shepard, is a retired cop. You have a great father, my is just a teacher. His name is barnaby, he's 13 years old. We have a k 9 unit in our area. Teaching is a great profession, you should be proud. The older they're the smarter they get. I think you may be right about that, he is very smart. Thanks for your encouragement, I love to teach.

history: Hi how are you? I am doing great on this crisp fall night. Do you like sports? I love tennis and play it for a living. Sports are ok but I love cooking shows and cooking. My husband is a doctor so I cook meals and freeze them to have on hand. That is a great idea I am single so I only make enough for one. Well enjoy being single, we are growing our family so free time is short. But it is tough cause I am vegan and my friends are not. Bummer, I take my dog for long walks to De stress, how about you? I like to go skydiving or ride a rollercoaster. When its raining or too cold we walk the stairs in our home, three stories! Wow first floor apt for me so no stairs. With a big family we need the room, plus the dog. How many children do u have. Three and one on the way. The dog is like a child too.
